result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody K. Moser was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: $108 posted and applied to 15tr825  - balance for time served per Jail
from defendant to Judge and to defendant from Judge
per Nicole @ ONSO - in custody - ONSO
per Mary @ ONSO - detainer - Forest Cty
No appearance or payment of fine, court orders warrant

3:14 p.m. Defendant Cody K. Moser in court.  Court questions defendant as to non-payment.  Defendant states he just got released from jail - requests payment plan. Defendant requests all fines be included in payment plan.  Review hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

01:03 pm - Defendant Cody K. Moser in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Cody K. Moser in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 15cf81, 12cf266 (SEHR) and 15cf86 (PTC).  Court statement to non-receipt of Revocation and Warrant.  Richards files ROAW with Court.  In case 15cf86 - State moves to amend Count 1 to Poss THC - 961.41(3g)(e) and amend Count 2 to Poss Illegally Obtained RX - 450.11(7)(h) - Granted.  Defendant pleads no contest.  Plea questionnaire filed.    Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty.  Michlig/Richards/Court statement to sentencing.
Court Sentence - 15cf86 - Both Counts
Court Costs $243/DNA Surcharge $200
DNA Sample
Jail - 3 months - CC to each other but CS to Revocation Sentences - W/Huber for all purposes
The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).
Court Sentence - 12cf266 - Count 1
Jail - 6 months - W/Huber for all purposes - Jail credit 100 days
Outstanding court costs reduced to civil judgment
Court Sentence - 13cf81 - Counts 2 and 4 Concurrent to 12cf266
Jail 6 months - W/Huber for all purposes - Jail credit 108 days
Outstanding court costs reduced to civil judgment
Appeal rights given

10:46 am - Defendant Cody K. Moser in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Cody K. Moser in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 12cf266, 13cf81 (SEHR) and 15cf86 (PTC).  Michlig/Richards states there is not an order indicating defendant's probation has been revoked.  Revocation Order and Warrant has not been rec'd by court - only revocation packet was rec'd by email.  Sentencing after Revocation was scheduled prior to receipt of ROAW.  Richards states would like to reschedule hearings in order to receive Revocation Order and Warrant.  Bail will be continued in case 15cf86.  Pretrial conference scheduled for June 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery

04:25 pm - Defendant Cody K. Moser in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Cody K. Moser in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.  State files Information, waives reading and enters not guilty pleas on behalf of defendant.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Cody K. Moser in court  via video with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Cody K. Moser in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
2:49
In receipt, waive reading -request prelim 
Bail continued  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

1:29 p.m. Defendant Cody K. Moser in court, in custody. Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Defendant has contacted public defender. Defendant currently on probation hold. Statement to bail - Court sets $3,000 signature bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
